description: You can use this operation to use default (username and clientID) attribute or custom attribute mappings.

parameters.name: IdentityPoolId
parameters.description: The ID of the Identity Pool you want to set attribute mappings for.

parameters.name: IdentityProviderName
parameters.description: The provider name you want to use for attribute mappings.

parameters.name: PrincipalTags
parameters.description: You can use this operation to add principal tags. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: IdentityPoolId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Identity Pool you want to set attribute mappings for.

nested_items.name: IdentityProviderName
nested_items.description: The provider name you want to use for attribute mappings.

nested_items.name: UseDefaults
nested_items.description: You can use this operation to select default (username and clientID) attribute mappings.

nested_items.name: PrincipalTags
nested_items.description: You can use this operation to add principal tags. The ``PrincipalTags``operation enables you to reference user attributes in your IAM permissions policy.
